store_item.name: Basic Pack
store_item.desc: Gives one random card from Standard Set.

store_item.name: Blue Fire Pack
store_item.desc: Consume 40 Blue Fire Souls and gives one card from Standard Set guaranteed ^c8E5FRare ^cFFFFor higher.

store_item.name: Basic Pack x10
store_item.desc: Gives one random card from Standard Set. Ten times!

store_item.name: Powder Reward Pack
store_item.desc: Combine 25 Inscription Powder and gives one random card from Reward Set.

store_item.name: Dust Pack x10
store_item.desc: Gives ten random cards from Standard Set and automatically vaporizes all Common and Rare cards!

store_item.name: Dust Pack x50
store_item.desc: Gives fifty random cards from Standard Set and automatically vaporizes all Common and Rare cards!

store_item.name: Legacy Basic Pack x10
store_item.desc: A pack intended for collectors! This pack gives ten random cards from both the Standard Set and retired cards from the Legacy Set.

store_item.name: Express Dust Pack
store_item.desc: Quickly convert your Gold! Gives one ^cF90FArcane Motherlode^cFFFF worth 1450 Arcane Dust, the expected amount from vaporizing all cards from 500 Basic Packs!

store_item.name: Rare Pack
store_item.desc: Gives two cards from Standard Set with one guaranteed ^c8E5FRare ^cFFFFor higher.

store_item.name: Epic Pack
store_item.desc: Gives four cards from Standard Set with one guaranteed ^c0DFFEpic ^cFFFFor higher.

store_item.name: Legendary Pack
store_item.desc: Gives four cards from Standard Set with one guaranteed ^cE7FFLegendary ^cFFFF.

store_item.name: Double Legendary Reward Pack
store_item.desc: Gives two copies of one ^cE7FFLegendary ^cFFFFcard from Reward Set.

store_item.name: Legendary Reward Pack
store_item.desc: Gives one ^cE7FFLegendary^cFFFF card from Reward Set!

store_item.name: Gold Premium Card
store_item.desc: Gives one copy of a ^cE7FFEl Bronceadon^cFFFF! May be purchased unlimited times.

store_item.name: Dust Satchel
store_item.desc: Gives 200 Arcane Dust! May be purchased an unlimited number of times!

store_item.name: Pile of Gold Coins
store_item.desc: 200 Gold!

store_item.name: Pouch of Gold Coins
store_item.desc: 500 Gold!

store_item.name: Stack of Gold Bars
store_item.desc: 2,500 Gold!

store_item.name: Bounty Bundle +3
store_item.desc: Automatically gain 3 new Bounty Targets!

store_item.name: Bounty Bundle +10
store_item.desc: Automatically gain 10 new Bounty Targets!

store_item.name: Raid Refill +20
store_item.desc: Use to gain +20 Raid attacks.

store_item.name: Dungeon Refill +20
store_item.desc: Use to gain +20 Dungeon attacks.

store_item.name: Random Tribe Health Rune
store_item.desc: Creates one random Tribe Rune of Health.

store_item.name: Runecrafter's Pouch
store_item.desc: Contains various Runecrafting components, including a chance at Runeshells and even ^cE7FFLegendary Rune Slivers^cFFFF.

store_item.name: Runecrafter's Chest
store_item.desc: Contains 10x Runecrafter's Pouches, plus an additional guaranteed Rune.

store_item.name: Random Rune
store_item.desc: Creates one random Rare+ Rune.

store_item.name: Mysterious Egg
store_item.desc: A mysterious egg our goblin merchant friend picked up during our travels. No one knows where it came from.

store_item.desc: Contains between 10 and 25 Embersouls! Used to create the Mythic card ^cF90FNarix, Dragonlord^cFFFF!

store_item.name: Drake's Mystery Treasure Jackpot
store_item.desc: Cycling Jackpot

store_item.name: Cycling Item
store_item.desc: Gives the displayed item. May be purchased multiple times, but the price increases each purchase!
store_item.preview_desc: Unlocks a random Item that can be purchased with gold and cycles every 24 hours!

store_item.name: Cycling Rune
store_item.desc: Gives a single copy of the displayed rune. May be purchased multiple times, but the price increases each purchase!
store_item.preview_desc: Unlocks a random Legendary rune that can be purchased with shards and cycles every 24 hours!

store_item.name: Cycling Legendary Reward Card
store_item.desc: Gives a single copy of the displayed Reward card. May be purchased up to 4 times, but the price increases each purchase!
store_item.preview_desc: Unlocks a random ^cE7FFLegendary ^cFFFFReward card that can be purchased with Arena Trophies and cycles every 24 hours!

store_item.name: Cycling Epic Reward Card
store_item.desc: Gives a single copy of the displayed Reward card. May be purchased multiple times!
store_item.preview_desc: Unlocks a random ^c0DFFEpic ^cFFFFReward card that can be purchased with Arena Trophies and cycles every 24 hours!

store_item.name: Cycling Stones x10
store_item.desc: Gives 10 stones of the displayed Reward Champion card. May be purchased multiple times, but the price increases each purchase!
store_item.preview_desc: Unlocks stones for a random Reward Champion that can be purchased with shards and cycles every 24 hours!

store_item.name: Cycling Legendary Chaos Card
store_item.desc: Gives a single copy of the displayed Premium card. May be purchased multiple times, but the price increases after 4 purchases!
store_item.preview_desc: Unlocks a random Chaos ^cE7FFLegendary ^cFFFFcard that can be purchased with shards and cycles every 24 hours!

store_item.name: Cycling Legendary Wyld Card
store_item.desc: Gives a single copy of the displayed Premium card. May be purchased multiple times, but the price increases after 4 purchases!
store_item.preview_desc: Unlocks a random Wyld ^cE7FFLegendary ^cFFFFcard that can be purchased with shards and cycles every 24 hours!

store_item.name: Cycling Legendary Aether Card
store_item.desc: Gives a single copy of the displayed Premium card. May be purchased multiple times, but the price increases after 4 purchases!
store_item.preview_desc: Unlocks a random Aether ^cE7FFLegendary ^cFFFFcard that can be purchased with shards and cycles every 24 hours!

store_item.name: Cycling Epic Premium Card
store_item.desc: Gives a single copy of the displayed Premium card. May be purchased multiple times, but the price increases after 4 purchases!
store_item.preview_desc: Unlocks a random ^c0DFFEpic ^cFFFFcard that can be purchased with shards and cycles every 24 hours!
